channel.title: Gooapple?
channel.description: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h8-Mz47w0DU[/youtube] I found about a similar looking phone in design to the Iphone, and according to the news it runs some kind of OS (i do not know the name of it) and has an A8 Chip and the same retina display by apple... I Love APPLE but is this FAKE worth getting?... but what do you think about this product? Is it worth getting at all? Discuss.

item.title: Gooapple?
item.dc:creator: @sin21 sin2^
item.description:
@sin21 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:8, topic:427841”][quote author=Locke88 link=topic=530533.msg3875785#msg3875785 date=1325661303]
Why won’t apple and android sue gooapple?
[/quote]

because they are not samsung.[/quote]
+1

Read full topic

item.title: Gooapple?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

I’ve had a chance to play with a knockoff iPhone and they’re honestly complete junk, if you could compare it to iOS it would be its mentally handicapped brother

I’ve only played with one type, but I’d assume others aren’t that different, you definitely get what you pay for

Read full topic

item.title: Gooapple?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Problem with Chinese phones is yes maybe 100 of the phones had the specs listed but then they start downgrading, usually first step is removal of the GPS chip, then a slower processor, and before you know it the entire design is produced by another factory changing it further.

However I will say the Star A6000 is a rather nice phone and at 360rmb it was well worth the money i spent on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Gooapple?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Locke88:

and the reason why america is on a bad economy.

that might have something to do with apple opting to make iphones in china but nope, the reason america has a bad economy is because of knockoffs from the same people who make the iphones in the first place!

item.title: Gooapple?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Aaaah ignorance.[quote=“chillwitm888, post:3, topic:427841”][quote author=tL link=topic=530533.msg3874285#msg3874285 date=1325552060]
I don’t think it has any of the specifications you’ve said it has. All the things I can find about it on the web give it a very low resolution screen and a very slow processor.

If you want an Android phone, get an Android phone. If you want an iPhone, get an iPhone. This phone doesn’t do justice to either platform, it’s Android 2.2.
[/quote]
your right, it wasn’t the gooapple, it was the hiphone, i didn’t look at the name correctly.
Both chinese phones. I have an Ipad and ipad 2 no other tablets can ever beat it I just find apple products fantastic.
updated the video on what i was going on about[/quote]

Another simple minded Apple lemming, how cute.

Read full topic

i mean look at these dumbasses. they made an obvious knockoff of the iphone 4. and their logo is that of an android. these chinks stole the technology behind the iphone and their still going to steal more ideas. china makes copies of everything. and the reason why america is on a bad economy.[/quote]
